Subtask 1/12.activity: Arrival at Hobbs Cafe and getting ready for shift

Subtask 2/12.activity: Meeting with the manager to discuss daily tasks and specials

Subtask 3/12.activity: Reviewing tables, taking orders, and setting up for lunch service

Subtask 4/12.activity: Greeting customers, taking orders, and delivering food and drinks

Subtask 5/12.activity: Handling cash transactions and operating the point-of-sale system

Subtask 6/12.activity: Maintaining a clean and organized workspace, including restocking supplies and cleaning tables

Subtask 7/12.activity: Taking orders and delivering food and drinks to customers during lunch service

Subtask 8/12.activity: Handling customer complaints and resolving issues in a professional manner

Subtask 9/12.activity: Restocking supplies, taking out the trash, and performing other tasks to maintain the cleanliness of the cafe

Subtask 10/12.activity: Assisting with closing duties, including counting down the cash register and securing the cafe for the evening

Subtask 11/12.activity: Reviewing the day's sales and preparing for the next shift

Subtask 12/12.activity: Wrapping up any remaining tasks and leaving for a short break before the evening shift
